meanings.sent1: I will preregister for the workshop to secure my spot.
meanings.sent2: Students often preregister for classes to avoid missing out on popular ones.
meanings.sent3: I decided to preregister for the race so I wouldn't have to rush on the day of the event.
meanings.sent4: She chose to preregister for the conference, ensuring her attendance.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to preregister early to guarantee your participation.

meanings.definition: To enroll or sign up beforehand
meanings.sent1: Before the deadline, make sure to preregister for the seminar.
meanings.sent2: It is advisable to preregister for the event to avoid last-minute hassles.
meanings.sent3: I always preregister for courses to beat the rush during registration week.
meanings.sent4: She decided to preregister for the workshop, securing her spot in advance.
meanings.sent5: Preregistering for the program will save you time on the day of the event.
